trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控制項的控制項陣列。

trans-unit.source: The `ListViewArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `ListView` array.
trans-unit.target: `ListViewArray`類別提供對等項目執行階段功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`ListView`陣列。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供 Visual Basic 6.0 控制項陣列的設計階段功能。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您具現化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray>，您也必須呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.SetIndex%2A>方法來建立陣列中的初始項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> where the control array will be hosted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />，其中將會裝載控制項陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" /> class, specifying its container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" /> 類別的新執行個體，並指定其容器。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您具現化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray>，您也必須呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.SetIndex%2A>方法來建立陣列中的初始項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者編輯項目的標籤時。

trans-unit.source: The `AfterLabelEdit` event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: `AfterLabelEdit`事件發生於使用者可讓您完成修改項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入項目的新字串會傳遞至事件和事件處理常式可以拒絕變更。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式會拒絕變更，文字會在使用者開始編輯項目之前時，還原成文字。

trans-unit.source: In order for the `AfterLabelEdit` event to be raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> control must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓`AfterLabelEdit`會引發事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A>控制項必須設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者開始編輯項目的標籤時。

trans-unit.source: The `BeforeLabelEdit` event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: `BeforeLabelEdit`當使用者開始修改項目的文字，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot change the text.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式取消這個事件，使用者無法變更文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件，若要防止使用者編輯中的特定項目的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, the `BeforeLabelEdit` event is not raised; all user attempts to change item labels are automatically rejected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制設為 `false`、`BeforeLabelEdit`不會引發事件; 若要變更項目標籤的所有使用者嘗試都會自動都遭拒。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the display area for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> in virtual mode has changed and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> determines that a new range of items is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於虛擬模式中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 的顯示區域內容已變更，並且 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 判斷需要新的項目範圍時。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to update the item information held in cache so that it is readily available.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件可讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>更新項目資訊保留在快取，讓它隨時可用。

trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a control is a member of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，判斷控制項是否為 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" /> 的成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="target" /> is a member of the control array; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="target" /> 為控制項陣列的成員，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned.
trans-unit.target: `CanExtend`方法可用來判斷特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項是其他項目已從中複製的控制項陣列的基底項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the focus or keyboard user interface (UI) cues change.
trans-unit.target: 發生於焦點或鍵盤使用者介面 (UI) 提示變更時。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes a <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件會傳遞<xref:System.EventArgs>至其事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 因此它只會顯示已發生按。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要更多滑鼠資訊 （按鈕點選、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>如果按一下因滑鼠，例如按下 ENTER 鍵以外的其他動作，將不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以設定應該才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間的時間。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: `Click`每當按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您有事件處理常式`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件[控制項](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)、`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>按兩下控制項時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: 如果按兩下控制項時，以及控制項不支援<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，`Click`事件可能會引發兩次。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控制項中的資料行行首時。

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnClick` event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details>).
trans-unit.target: `ColumnClick`使用者按一下其中一個資料行中的標頭的詳細資料檢視中的項目時，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項 (當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details>)。

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnClick` event is typically handled to sort the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, using the clicked column as the column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: `ColumnClick`事件通常用於排序的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，依排序的資料行使用按資料行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the column header order is changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料行標頭順序已變更時。

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnReordered` event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the [System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.Cancel](xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel) property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `ColumnReordered`事件可取消事件，且可以處理事件和設定取消[System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.Cancel](xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel)屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is canceled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果事件已取消，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs>不會變更為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>值。

trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: This event allows you to check the new column width with the `ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth` property, and cancel the event if you choose by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您檢查與新的資料行寬度`ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth`屬性，並取消事件，如果您選擇藉由設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The `DragEnter` event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: `DragEnter`當使用者第一次拖曳滑鼠游標移至控制項拖放作業期間，系統就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.

trans-unit.source: The `DragLeave` event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: `DragLeave`使用者拖曳出控制項的資料指標，或使用者取消目前的拖放作業時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.target: `DragOver`滑鼠游標拖放作業期間移動控制項的範圍內時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the details view of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is drawn and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 當已繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 的詳細資料檢視而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" /> 時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>使用主控描繪控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to `View.Details`.
trans-unit.target: 會引發此事件時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>屬性設定為`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為`View.Details`。

trans-unit.source: This event can occur for each column header in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項中的每個資料行標頭，可能會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關主控描繪的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>屬性參考主題。

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: `GiveFeedback`拖放作業開始時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用`GiveFeedback`事件的拖曳事件來源可以修改滑鼠指標外觀才能將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is activated.
trans-unit.target: 發生於啟動項目時。

trans-unit.source: The `ItemActivate` event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: `ItemActivate`在使用者啟動中的一個或多個項目時，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property, or with the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以啟用以按一下或按兩下，根據的值的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>屬性，或使用鍵盤。

trans-unit.source: From within the event handler for the `ItemActivate` event, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> properties to access the collection of items selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to determine which items are being activated.
trans-unit.target: 從事件處理常式內`ItemActivate`事件，您可以參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性來存取集合的項目中選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>來判斷哪些項目會使其無法啟動。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者開始拖曳項目時。

trans-unit.source: The `ItemDrag` event occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: `ItemDrag`當使用者開始拖曳項目時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: Typically the event handler for the `ItemDrag` event performs the task of dragging by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 通常的事件處理常式`ItemDrag`事件執行的拖曳藉由呼叫工作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks necessary to drag items into and out of your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來執行拖曳項目，執行和跳離您的應用程式所需的工作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The I`temSelectionChanged` event occurs whether the item state changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed and the control has focus.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 按鍵事件會依下列順序發生：

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>中表單的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件處理方法來`true`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed and the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按下按鍵且焦點在控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 按鍵事件會依下列順序發生：

trans-unit.source: The `KeyPress` event is not raised by non-character keys; however, the non-character keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: `KeyPress`非字元按鍵不引發事件; 不過，並引發非字元按鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>屬性範例按鍵輸入，在執行階段，並且將會使用或修改一般按鍵的子集。

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>中表單的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件處理方法來`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項應重新調整其子控制項位置時。

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: `Layout`子控制項所新增或移除，當控制項變更，以及其他可能變更的範圍可能會影響控制項的配置時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 配置事件，可以使用抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: 暫止配置可讓您在控制項上執行多個動作，而不需要執行的每個變更的配置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您調整大小並移動控制項，每一項作業將會引發`Layout`事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 發生於以滑鼠按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control:
trans-unit.target: 當指標通常位於圖形上按滑鼠按鈕，就會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件：

trans-unit.source: Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: 關閉發生兩次按一下足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將會產生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件，而不是第二個`MouseClick`事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> 事件是控制項的以邏輯方式較高層級事件。

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 它們通常會引發受到其他動作，例如，當控制項取得焦點時按下 ENTER 鍵。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標停留在控制項上時。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: 典型用法`MouseHover`是當滑鼠停留 （「 停留矩形內，"） 的控制項周圍的指定區域內的控制項上時顯示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒為單位的指定會引發這個事件所需的暫停<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `MouseHover`事件定義，且與偵測到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 發生於重設控制項大小時。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的調整大小的控制項，您可以轉型`sender`參數<xref:System.EventArgs>資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>並取得其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>屬性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>屬性個別)。

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理自訂版面配置，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>事件，而不是`Resize`事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>引發以回應`Resize`事件，但也在其他會影響控制項的配置變更回應。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is in virtual mode and a search is taking place.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 處於虛擬模式，而且已經開始進行搜尋時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 就會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>處於虛擬模式和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should calculate which item from the list of items supplied by the Items property matches the search criteria and set the `SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index` property to the index of the ListViewItem.
trans-unit.target: 當處理此事件，您應該計算的項目從清單中的項目屬性符合搜尋準則和集所提供的項目`SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index`屬性 ListViewItem 的索引。

trans-unit.source: If an item is not provided, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> and FindItemWithText will return a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供項目，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>和 FindItemWithText 會傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控制項陣列中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Short" /> that represents the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Short" />，代表指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray" />.

trans-unit.source: The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array.
trans-unit.target: `SetIndex`控制項陣列中建立的初始項目時，應該只呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: To add subsequent elements, call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method and specify the `Index`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將後續項目，呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>方法並指定`Index`。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 當您藉由呼叫中使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等） 變更焦點時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，或藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>屬性目前的表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>屬性設定為`false`、<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating>和`Validated`事件都會被隱藏。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>設`true`中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating>事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating>事件都會被隱藏。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is in virtual mode and the selection state of a range of items has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 處於虛擬模式，而且某個範圍之項目的選取狀態變更時。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is not in virtual mode, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.ItemSelectionChanged> event will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>不是處於虛擬模式，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.ItemSelectionChanged>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
